lead_paragraph: The mayor said he would end bond restructurings that push out debt payments to future years as well as the use of interest-rate swaps.

headline.print_headline: Illinois: Emanuel Proposes Plans for Restructing Bonds
headline.main: Illinois: Mayor Rahm Emanuel Proposes Plans for Restructing Bonds

snippet: The mayor said he would end bond restructurings that push out debt payments to future years as well as the use of interest-rate swaps.
abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel, as part of plan to help fix city's financial problems, says he will stop bond restructurings that move debt payments to future years as well as use of interest-rate swaps.
